entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 15 April 2023
